references.paper_title: Optimal testing for properties of distributions
references.reason: This paper establishes optimal sample complexity bounds for fundamental distribution testing problems, providing a foundational basis for the current work's improvements.
This paper is highly influential in distribution testing, introducing the closeness testing problem and establishing initial bounds that later research improved upon.

references.paper_title: Optimal algorithms for testing closeness of discrete distributions
references.reason: This paper provides optimal algorithms for closeness testing, a core problem addressed and improved upon in this work through the use of predictions.

references.paper_title: A new approach for testing properties of discrete distributions
references.reason: This paper introduces novel techniques for distribution testing, such as flattening, which are adopted and extended in this work to incorporate predictions.

references.paper_title: Estimating the unseen: Improved estimators for entropy and other properties
references.reason: This paper provides improved estimators for various distributional properties, offering techniques applicable to the analysis of prediction accuracy in this work.
